top.title: Could Trump's bid to become peacemaker-in-chief sideline the struggling UN?
top.summary: The US president has promised to "end decades of suffering" but critics dismiss his Board of Peace as a vainglorious project.

top.title: Eight surprise takeaways from the Oscar nominations
top.summary: Paul Mescal and Chase Infiniti missed out, while other actors carried their films to a nomination.

top.title: ICE detains five-year-old and father in Minnesota, lawyer says
top.summary: The boy was taken along with his father, the lawyer and school officials say. ICE says it kept the boy safe as his father ran.

top.title: TikTok closes deal to split US app from global business. Here's what to know
top.summary: The app was due to be banned in the US a year ago if its Chinese owner didn't sell its business in America.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.

top.title: AI ready: The advantages of being a young entrepreneur
top.summary: The latest generation of entrepreneurs have a head-start with AI but also face familiar challenges.
